roleset.name: argue over trifles
roleset.note: QUIBBLE-V NOTES: Based on WSJ. Member of VNcls battle-36.4-1. (from quibble.01-v)

example.name: nominal with arg
example.text: There can be no quibbling that the Armenians endured terrible suffering, but one has to wonder what possible good such a resolution will achieve.
example.arg: that the Armenians endured terrible suffering

example.name: with actors
example.text: John quibbles constantly with Mary over whose turn it is to clean the bathroom.
example.arg: over whose turn it is to clean the bathroom
